title: usachev
author: usachev
content: Hello.  I am a trader for several years.  I realized that some trading algorithms can be automated. I started learning to program in the last couple of years. And I wrote a trading bot.https://t.me/botforyoumoney He is currently trading on Binance. SpotOnly long positions.I show the results of trading in a telegram chat.If you have questions I can answer them.

comments.author: Jackthelad
comments.body: Looks good we'll your documenting trades but do you have a way of verifying your results my friend?

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: I don't know man, I don't like the idea of using a bot for trading. It just takes away the fun in trading, and you will most likely get addicted to it. When the algorithm change, you will make wrong decision based on your bot's prediction. But good work on making this. Keep it up. Try to find bugs and fix them. Hopefully you will be able to unlock its full potential then.

comments.author: usachev
comments.body: Quote from: tjtonmoy on February 02, 2023, 06:33:02 PMI don't know man, I don't like the idea of using a bot for trading. It just takes away the fun in trading, and you will most likely get addicted to it.I don't agree with youThe bot is just an assistant to you. I started by writing bots to send me the situations I needed on the market.When I received signals, I traded, sometimes there were a lot of them and I did not have time to gain 10-20 positions.Then I decided to just write a cryptocurrency bot based on my experience.Yes, the market may change, but backtests for 3 years show that this strategy works on cryptocurrenciesYes, I will continue to try to improve it.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: usachev on February 02, 2023, 07:51:26 PMYes, the market may change, but backtests for 3 years show that this strategy works on cryptocurrenciesYou could show us your backtest results, and we see how much profit it can make, and it's win rate.Better still, do you have a publicly available script for the strategy your bot uses on pine script? I would love to backtest it and see the result myself

comments.author: usachev
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on February 02, 2023, 10:46:15 PMYou could show us your backtest results, and we see how much profit it can make, and it's win rate.Here are some resultsI have 70 crypto coins now traded and I will not load all the charts. But many similarCOSOSUSDThttps://i.ibb.co/dkWD4QJ/cocos.pngAPEUSDThttps://i.ibb.co/v1cSxg8/apeusd.pngAUTOUSDThttps://i.ibb.co/7bJtk15/auto.png

comments.author: usachev
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on February 02, 2023, 10:46:15 PMBetter still, do you have a publicly available script for the strategy your bot uses on pine script? I would love to backtest it and see the result myselfHaving given you the code, I will tell you the strategy) I will just give you money)If you have a trading bot and you show me similar charts based on the results, I think we can agree on an exchange of strategies

comments.author: usachev
comments.body: This algorithm turned out to be shifted to the shares of American campaigns. Now let's run the test. When I trade on real ones, I'll post the results here.
